name: Tilt-A-Ball
description:
Tilt the platform to try and get the ball to the end! Sounds easy right? But there's a twist! You control ALL the platforms at once! Use momentum to get the ball rolling over obstacles, through holes and onto the green platform. Think you got what it takes? Try and get the fastest times among your friends! Can YOU beat all the courses?

Controls

  • A/D or ←/→ arrows to rotate the platforms
  • ESC to pause the menu
